publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-3968 Shirley-Anne Somerville: Beltane Fire Festival—That the Parliament welcomes this year’s Beltane Fire Festival; notes that the start of the summer celebrations will take place during the night of Thursday 30 April 2009; further notes that this unique wild procession of fire, drumming and revelry on Edinburgh’s Carlton Hill is a revival of the ancient Celtic fertility festival, and highlights the cultural influence that the Beltane Fire Society has on Edinburgh, with an estimated 12,000 people expected to attend.

S3M-3968 Shirley-Anne Somerville: Beltane Fire Festival—That the Parliament welcomes this year’s Beltane Fire Festival; notes that the start of the summer celebrations will take place during the night of Thursday 30 April 2009; further notes that this unique wild procession of fire, drumming and revelry on Edinburgh’s Carlton Hill is a revival of the ancient Celtic fertility festival, and highlights the cultural influence that the Beltane Fire Society has on Edinburgh, with an estimated 12,000 people expected to attend.
S3M-3968 Beltane Fire Festival (lodged on 23 April 2009) Michael Matheson*, Mike Pringle*, Stuart McMillan*, Rob Gibson*, Kenneth Gibson*
S3M-3968 Beltane Fire Festival (lodged on 23 April 2009) Ross Finnie*, Jamie Hepburn*, Angela Constance*, Bill Kidd*, Aileen Campbell*, Christina McKelvie*, Gil Paterson*, Robin Harper*
S3M-3968 Beltane Fire Festival (lodged on 23 April 2009) Sandra White*
